Description:
Detects cases in which ngrok, a reverse proxy tool, forwards events to the local RDP port, which could be a sign of malicious behaviour

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Ngrok Usage with Remote Desktop Service
Query: sourcetype='windows-terminalservices-localsessionmanager' eql select * from _source_ where eventid = '21' and address like '%16777216%'
